text: Mellrichstadt is a town in Rhön-Grabfeld, in Bavaria, Germany. It is 17 km southwest of Meiningen, and 13 km northeast of Bad Neustadt. It has the following villages: Bahra, Eußenhausen, Frickenhausen, Mühlfeld, Sondheim im Grabfeld, and Roßrieth. == Literature == Features in John Douglas-Gray's thriller 'The Novak Legacy' == References == Category:Rhön-Grabfeld
title: Mellrichstadt
